div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 160px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 400px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 131px; margin-left: 271px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
text-align: left
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 80px; margin-left: 442px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font: 第一次握手：客户端发送建立连接的请求，SYN表示连接操作，seq是请求的序列号

switch.text: 第一次握手：客户端发送建立连接的请求，SYN表示连接操作，seq是请求的序列号

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 254px; margin-left: 281px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
text-align: left
text-align: left
text-align: left
text-align: left
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 292px; margin-left: 442px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
第二次握手：服务端响应客户端，SYN表示连接操作，seq是请求的序列号，ACK是确认的位码，ack为确认响应的序列号+1
在这一步，服务端证明了自己既可以接收消息也可以发送消息

switch.text: 第二次握手：服务端响应客户端，SYN表示连接操作，seq是请求的序列号，ACK是确认的位码，ack为确认响应的序列号+1...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 409px; margin-left: 278px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
text-align: left
text-align: left
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 515px; margin-left: 443px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font: 第三次握手：客户端接受到服务端消息后，确认seq为第一次发送给服务端的seq+1，且ACK=1，则再次发送ACK=1，ack=2001给服务端，服务端确认ack的值与第一次发送给客户端的seq+1相同，且ACK=1，则表示连接建立成功

switch.text: 第三次握手：客户端接受到服务端消息后，确认seq为第一次发送给服务端的seq+1，且ACK=1，则再次发送ACK=1，ack=2...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 95px; margin-left: 115px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: 证明客户端可以发送消息

switch.text: 证明客户端可以发送消息

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 195px; margin-left: 414px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: 证明服务端可以收发消息

switch.text: 证明服务端可以收发消息

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 425px; margin-left: 105px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: 证明客户端可以接收消息

switch.text: 证明客户端可以接收消息
